    • Constructor Detail

      • PluginManager

        public PluginManager()

    • Method Detail

      • findAndSetupPlugins

        public static void findAndSetupPlugins()
        Loads all plugins annotated with Plugin found by the client and plugin class loader.
        This method should only be called once ever.

      • registerEventClass

        public static void registerEventClass(java.lang.Object instance)
        Registers a class that contains EventCallback annotated methods, and maps those methods correctly.
        This method must only be called within Plugin.Setup or in a constructor/initializer of a plugin.
        Parameters:
        instance - an instance of a class containing EventCallback annotated methods

      • callEvent

        public static void callEvent(Event event)
        Propagates an Event to its event listeners.
        Parameters:
        event - an instance of Event

      • activatePlugins

        public static void activatePlugins()
        Activate all plugins.
        Safely invokes (PluginContainer.activateMethod) of all loaded plugins.

      • deactivatePlugins

        public static void deactivatePlugins()
        Deactivate all plugins.
        Safely invokes (PluginContainer.deactivateMethod) of all loaded plugins.

      • refreshPlugins

        public static void refreshPlugins()
        Refresh all plugins.
        Safely invokes (PluginContainer.refreshMethod) of all loaded plugins.
